portal.title: Portal ID
portal.help: The zportal ID (so the part before .zportal.nl)

token.title: API Token
token.help: Zermelo API token. Mark as secret in Yodeck if possible.

branch.title: Vestiging (branch code)
branch.help: The branch/vestigings code found in Portal inrichting -> Vestigingen.

departmentsIgnore.title: [Optional] Ignore departments (comma separated)
departmentsIgnore.help: Some departments should not be taken into consideration while determining if a whole education or yearOfEducation is present in an appointment.

mergeAppointments.title: [Optional] Merge Appointments
mergeAppointments.help: If checked, merge multiple hour spans into single entries (default: true).

external.title: [Optional] External location name
external.help: If you add the location with this name to an appointment, Rowizer will show the attending teachers just below the absent ones. This way, students will quickly see that a certain teacher is not available at school.

date.title: [Optional] Test Date
date.help: Use to preview a specific date.
